info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Transylvania, southeastern Haywood, northwestern Greenville and northern Pickens Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Brevard to 15 miles north of Pickens. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Graveyard Fields, Looking Glass, Table Rock State Park, Caesars Head State Park, Black Balsam Area, Jones Gap State Park, Dupont State Forest and Slater-Marietta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
